definition: (military) a tunnel dug to defeat similar activities by the enemy, to destroy enemy mines with one's own mines
details:
noun
- (military) a tunnel dug to defeat similar activities by the enemy
verb
- to destroy enemy mines with one's own mines
= example: to destroy enemy mines with one's own mines
- to destroy property or hinder normal operations
= synonyms: sabotage, weaken, undermine, subvert, counteract
